Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Necklace
Description: Necklace reconstructed after excavation. Once again, this necklace comprises different kinds of beads, blue enamel beads and disc-shaped ostrich eggshell beads. The latter are grouped in the centre in three sets of seventeen, eight and fifteen beads, respectively. The enamel beads may have come from Egypt.
